description:
What Do You Think Other People Notice About You First?你觉得别人首先会注意到你哪一点？

获得7.8K 好评的回答@Sam Heyman

In 2003 I had a serious skydiving accident while at university and broke my spine, pelvis and both heels. 在2003年，上大学的我遭遇了一场严重的滑翔事故，导致我的脊椎、盆骨、以及脚后跟严重受伤。

The only thing that works miracles is smiling. My mother, who passed away shortly after my skydiving accident, always used to say “smile and the world smiles with you, cry and you cry alone”. 值得庆幸的是奇迹在向我微笑。我的母亲，在事故不久之后去世了，生前她常说：“你微笑，世界会陪着你微笑；你哭，却是你一个人自己哭。”

So what do people notice about me? That I smile a lot.所以人们会注意到我的什么呢？答案就是我一直都在微笑。

获得130好评的回答@Tom Pegler

My height我的身高。

I am short. About 5′4 last time I checked. This tends to provoke only a few reactions.我很矮，上次测量是5.4英寸，但这似乎不会引起很多关注。

获得140好评的回答@William Michael Kelly

My facial scar.我脸上的伤疤。

I forget that I have it right on my face and that it is the first thing that most people see. I see it everyday and been well-adjusted as normal, but I’ve heard that it’s far from ordinary.我都忘了脸上有伤疤，但是它确实是每个人一开始会注意到的。我每天都会看到也觉得习以为常了，但对于别人来说却不平常。

获得208好评的回答@Faith Paul

My body and face! The second thing they probably ask themselves is, “How old is she?”我的身体和脸。 其次他们可能会想：“她到底几岁了？”

获得156好评的回答@Emily Scappin

My hair.我的头发。

It’s incredibly long and ridiculously thick and wavy. I, uh, haven’t had a haircut in a while.我的头发非常长，而且非常厚重，呈波浪状。我已经很久没去理发了。

获得409好评的回答@Jake Williams

Usually my voice. 向来是我的声音。

I have quite a distinctive voice. Deep compared to what most seem to expect, and due to several moves my accent isn't tied to any location.我有着一副特别的嗓音，比什么都低沉，也因为我搬过几次家，并没有口音。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: Quora精选：别人首先会注意到你哪一点？

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

               

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Surface
Surface refers to what is on the outside. What does the surface look like? Why does it have that appearance? What is the importance?
This week's topic: They touched the surface... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) surface of a calm lake
2) surface of the moon
3) surface judgement
4) surface area
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Indeed, not only was the audio surveillance device not at the location he saw last time, the device did not get displaced to another location along the surface of the manager's desk either. It was removed completely. The interior designer kept his head down as he was picking up his dropped pen. In the meantime, he quickly scanned around from the corner of his eye. With his lower point of view, he was trying to see if he could spot other possible devices installed on the underside of the different surfaces.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
